replies.body: Sounds about right. Making my third account now after having 2 banned for playing too well and being frustrated at poor players.
banned for "playing too well?" SURE.........{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Maybe not "too good" but either way. Trolling on league is great fun, its not a good game anymore lol. I used to get hella heated. Now when I play i give 0 hoots :3
congratulations...you spend exorbitant amounts of time doing something you have declared has no value to you. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

How can something, like just letting go of being ultra competitive to just casually being trolly, be fun to me and have 0 value? 10/10 logic there, IQ checkm8 that was a gr8 db8 ur iq is prolly 88..  I love how I am below threshold too, but that is expected on the game's actual site. You're oxymoron has 35 up votes, for the sake of homerism to league of legends lol. Good riddance, and how is 1 or 2 games a week(exorbitant - nice try guy, you aren't smart)excessive ?  .012% of my time a week = A lot, only to a blind league homer and it's minions. Thanks for playing! {{summoner:11}}
i truthfully don't think it matters...but my IQ is 123 and my yearly wages reflect this. Merry Christmas{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

And when someone tries to denounce you as a troll you pull out the golden line: "Oh ofcourse, blame the jungler."
http://imgur.com/1uI20Oz

When was Teemo considered a hero?



-...outside of Bandle City i mean.

There, fixed:

http://i.imgur.com/IKtrWFj.jpg

... ... Okay... maybe I fixed it a little too much.
Riot doesn't count either, as they are the ones who created Bandle City :P
^ That's my boii~!!.

Another equivalent...

At first I was like

{{champion:86}} Top lane
{{champion:122}} Top lane pls
{{champion:54}}  Top pref

But now I'm like

{{champion:26}}  Top or feed
Unlike a troll, I never operated under the pretense of good; I was always playing LoL for evil.
I had a feeling you'd be here :3
What can I say, I am drawn to the depraved and despicable like a sadist is drawn to suffering.

I'm drawn to the evil villain cliche of "Mwahahah and now I shall press THIS button and destroy the world!" Except it's not the world it's the enemy mid laner.
Hello, Veigar.

Excellent my good sir. Go forth onto the Rift and efficaciously annihilate your foes with unfathomable power drawn from a plethora of AP
Next champion: a shark with laser beams attached to its head.
Frickin' laser beams.

https://soundcloud.com/everything_heavy/razor-sharp-by-pegboard-nerds

Here, have a song named "Lazer Shark!"

PS: Dont know why they misspelled the title, it so clearly shouted "LAZEEER SHAAARK" by the girl in the song...

But what if your not trolling and just trying to get the most out a kit? I do that with {{champion:150}} and quite a few other champions.

Nice Austin Powers meme.
i kid you not my jax jungle raged at me when he was on MY TEAM  because i was playing a noob no skill champ and he told me to drink bleach becuase i was fed as illaoi
People take the game wayyyy to seriously, I don't think playing a certain champ warrants you to commit suicide. People are so dumb.
yes, yes they are.

Yikes... That's horrible!

But I build some AP on {{champion:150}} with {{item:3146}} & {{item:3116}} . He does scale with AP on his Hyper proc at a 100% scaling and on GNAR! with a surprising 50% AP scaling, it also has a paltry +20% Bonus AD scaling. And if you hit a wall: Bonus AD +30%, AP +75%.
ap gnar sounds like something i would like lol
ryleas would be super good on gnar i never thought of it but it seems really effective
